imdb.plot outline: Ichigo Hoshimiya is a regular, ordinary middle school girl. But when her best friend, Aoi, invites her to join the idol training academy, Starlight Academy, her whole world is turned upside down. As she encounters all kinds of rivals and learns what it takes to be an idol, she uses her Aikatsu Cards to challenge countless auditions.
imdb.title: Aikatsu!
plot: Ichigo Hoshimiya is a regular, ordinary middle school girl. But when her best friend, Aoi, invites her to join the idol training academy, Starlight Academy, her whole world is turned upside down. As she encounters all kinds of rivals and learns what it takes to be an idol, she uses her Aikatsu Cards to challenge countless auditions.

camera: Arri Alexa Plus, Zeiss Ultra Prime, Fujinon Alura, Angenieux HR and Optimo Lenses
Arri Alexa XT Plus, Zeiss Master Prime, Ultra Prime, Fujinon Alura and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
